LanguageData.CE_AutoLoader_DropAmmoDesc: Unload this autoloader's contents onto the floor.
LanguageData.CE_AutoLoader_ForceReloadDesc: Reload adjacent turrets immediately. Forbidden turrets and currently firing turrets will be ignored.
LanguageData.CE_AutoLoader_NoTurretToReload: {0} cannot find any adjacent available {1} turrets.
LanguageData.CE_AutoLoader_ToggleReplaceDescOn: The autoloader will replace turret's current ammo with the ammo type in the loader.
LanguageData.CE_AutoLoader_ToggleReplaceDescOff: The autoloader will only reload turret with the same ammo type in the loader.
LanguageData.CE_AutoLoaderBusy: Autoloader is reloading or being reloaded.
